job_title: Primary School Teacher in Luton, East of England, England
pros: Flexible, understanding team, friendly and helpful in all situations. System is good for new staff and you can carry on with other positions opening up in the college to take on. Entirely up to you which shifts you want to take
cons: Only during mock or exam season
